text: Investor Alert: Preppers, Prospectors, and Off-Grid Dreamers This One s For You! Welcome to your wild, untamed slice of Arizona freedom over 120 acres of federally PATENTED mining claims (yep, eight of them!), tucked just 3.5 miles west of historic Oatman. This isn t your average patch of dirt this is the kind of property that gets whispered about at investor meetups and prepper forums. Why? Because it s got everything you could ever want and then some. Let s start with the basics: Patented mining claims mean you re not leasing you own it. That includes mineral rights AND water rights. That s right you can mine it, build it, live on it, subdivide it, camp on it, sell rock from it, drill a well, or just disappear and live your best off-grid life. You make the rules out here. The land itself is a glorious mix of rugged mountains, rolling terrain, and open sky. The front 40+ acres are flat, buildable, and ready for your imagination whether that s an RV park, a sustainable compound, or a money-making rock yard. There s even more buildable land tucked in the back, surrounded by the kind of natural beauty people pay top dollar to visit and it could be yours. And oh, did we mention the gold mine? Yes a historic mine that was abandoned in the late 1800s not because it ran dry, but because they hit an underground river. Let that sink in. Assays from the site come in at oz of gold per ton a number that makes seasoned prospectors sit up straight. And thanks to that underground water, you ve got natural resources to work with that go way beyond just shiny rocks. The property is already surveyed and staked, so you re not dealing with guesswork just opportunity. And here's the kicker: it sits in a box canyon, so once you control the front access, you own the whole canyon experience. Want seclusion, privacy, or security? You ve got it. This place is an investor s sandbox and a prepper s paradise. Bring a 4x4 if you want to explore the full expanse trust us, the backcountry is worth the bounce. This land is bold, it s raw, and it s ready for your vision. Properties like this don t come along often, and when they do, smart investors grab them fast. Strike gold, build an empire, or live the off-grid dream the choice is yours. Call your agent and start claiming your piece of the wild frontier!
formatted_address: Highway 66, Mohave Valley, AZ, 86440
